00025 #include <robot/sim/SimulatedRobot>
00026 
00027 #include <sstream>
00028 
00029 #include <base/Application>
00030 
00031 #include <robot/sim/SimulatedPlatform>
00032 #include <robot/sim/SimulatedSerialManipulator>
00033 
00034 using robot::sim::SimulatedRobot;
00035 
00036 using base::Application;
00037 using base::VFile;
00038 using robot::SerialManipulator;
00039 using robot::sim::SimulatedPlatform;
00040 using robot::sim::SimulatedSerialManipulator;
00041  
00042 
00043 SimulatedRobot::SimulatedRobot(String robotSpecFile)
00044 {
00045   // Read in spec file (check filetype)
00046   ref<VFile> file = Application::getInstance()->universe()->cache()->getFile(robotSpecFile);
00047 
00048   // read old JDKengine DH-parameter input file format
00049   if (file->extension() == "dh") {
00050     // file doesn't specify robot or platform info
00051     name = String("untitled");
00052     platform = ref<SimulatedPlatform>(NewObj SimulatedPlatform());
00053 
00054     // read in parameters
00055     SerialManipulator::Parameters p;
00056     String manipName;
00057     try {
00058       loadDHFile(file,p,manipName);
00059     } catch (std::exception&) {
00060       throw std::invalid_argument(Exception(robotSpecFile+": file is not a valid .dh file."));
00061     }
00062     manipulators.push_back(ref<SimulatedSerialManipulator>(NewObj SimulatedSerialManipulator(manipName,p)));
00063     manipulatorOffsets.push_back(Vector(6)); // zero offset
00064   }
00065   else
00066     throw std::invalid_argument(Exception(robotSpecFile+": file format unsupported."));
00067 }
00068 
00069 
00070 
00071 void SimulatedRobot::loadDHFile(ref<base::VFile> file, SerialManipulator::Parameters& p, String& manipName)
00072 {
00073   char linebuf[256];
00074 
00075   std::istream& in(file->istream());
00076   
00077   in >> manipName; // robot name
00078   Int M; // no. of joints
00079   in >> M;
00080   in.getline(linebuf,256); // skip to end of line
00081   
00082   // get parameters for each joint
00083   Int j=0;
00084   p.resize(M); 
00085 
00086   while ( (j<M) && in) {
00087     
00088     in.getline(linebuf,256);
00089     String line(linebuf);
00090     if ((line.length() > 1) && (line[0] != '#')) { // if not blank or comment
00091       
00092       std::istringstream iss(line);
00093       SerialManipulator::JointParameters jp;
00094       iss >> jp.alpha;
00095       jp.alpha = base::degToRad(jp.alpha);
00096       iss >> jp.a;
00097       String d;
00098       iss >> d;
00099       if (d=="d") {
00100         jp.type = SerialManipulator::JointParameters::Prismatic;
00101         jp.d = 0;
00102         jp.minLimit = 0; jp.maxLimit = base::Infinity;
00103       }
00104       else 
00105         jp.d = base::stringToReal(d);
00106       
00107       String theta;
00108       iss >> theta;
00109       if (theta == "theta") {
00110         jp.type = SerialManipulator::JointParameters::Revolute;
00111         jp.theta = 0;
00112         jp.minLimit = -base::Pi; jp.maxLimit = base::Pi; // !!! appropriate? (or 0-360?)
00113       }
00114       else
00115         jp.theta = base::degToRad(base::stringToReal(theta));
00116 
00117       jp.minAccel = -base::Infinity; jp.maxAccel = base::Infinity;
00118       
00119       p[j] = jp;
00120       
00121       j++;
00122     }
00123   }
00124     
00125   file->close();
00126  }
